scripts.deploy:all: yarn check:target && yarn check:config && yarn deploy:_back-layer && yarn deploy:_back && yarn deploy:_front
scripts.deploy:_front: cd front && yarn build && yarn deploy && cd ..
scripts.install:all: yarn install:_back-layer && yarn install:_back && yarn install:_front
scripts.install:_back: cd back && yarn install && yarn install:extra && cd ..
scripts.start: echo 'Dont `yarn start` here.  Read the docs.  You need to have four shells: first yarn start from back/ and then yarn start from front/'
